prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Brass, Guitar, Piano, Pipe, Bass, Drums, Reed, but without Strings.
captions:
Style 1:
This composition features Brass, Guitar, Piano, Pipe, Bass, Drums, and Reed, but excludes Strings.

Style 2:
This song is comprised of Brass, Guitar, Piano, Pipe, Bass, Drums, and Reed, but Strings are not included.

Style 3:
This piece has Brass, Guitar, Piano, Pipe, Bass, Drums, and Reed, but no Strings.
